alert.note: Alert for Apple and Lucerne Valleys; Coachella Valley; Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 09 at 4:19AM PDT until May 10 at 12:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO NOON PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains, Riverside County Mountains, San Diego County Mountains, Apple and Lucerne Valleys, Coachella Valley, San Diego County Deserts and San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to noon PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Apple and Lucerne Valleys; Coachella Valley; Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
